file.name: latest.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0

info:
  description: This is API for MIREA Schedule System (MSS), made by @serguun42.
  version: "1.3.0"
  contact:
    name: MSS API
    url: https://mirea.xyz/docs/api
  license:
    name: 'BSL-1.0'
    url: 'https://github.com/serguun42/mss/blob/master/LICENSE'
  title: MSS API
  x-logo:
    url: 'https://mirea.xyz/img/logo_wide.png'

servers:
  - description: MSS Production Server, API version 1.3.0
    url: https://mirea.xyz/api/v1.3/

tags:
  - name: groups
    description: Everything about groups
  - name: time
    description: Fetch or sync time (weeks, days, etc.)
  - name: stats
    description: Get overall statistics
  - name: logs
    description: Getting logs from some sources (e.g. app)

paths:
  /groups/all:
    get:
      description: "Get all groups names"
      operationId: getAllGroups
      tags:
        - groups
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/TinyGroup'
        default:
          description: Some (un)expected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SomeError'
  /groups/certain:
    get:
      description: "Get groups by name and optional suffix"
      operationId: getCertainGroups
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: name
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: >
            Corresponds for group name while searching for group(s).
          example: "ИКБО-03-20"
        - in: query
          name: suffix
          schema:
            type: string
          description: >
            Corresponds for group suffix name while searching for group(s). Used for specifying response with groups.
          example: "ИППО"
      tags:
        - groups
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/RichGroup'
        default:
          description: Some (un)expected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SomeError'

  /time/startTime:
    get:
      description: "Get timestamp (in ms) of starting of study term (half-year one)"
      operationId: getStartTime
      tags:
        - time
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: date-time
                example: "2021-08-29T21:00:00.000Z"
        default:
          description: Some (un)expected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SomeError'
  /time/week:
    get:
      description: "Get current week – starting with 1. Week in study-term"
      operationId: getCurrentWeek
      tags:
        - time
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: number
                example: 10
        default:
          description: Some (un)expected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SomeError'

  /stats:
    get:
      description: "Get some statistic (like total groups count or last updated time)"
      operationId: stats
      tags:
        - stats
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Stats'
        default:
          description: Some (un)expected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SomeError'

  /logs/post:
    post:
      description: "Post logs from app, front, etc."
      operationId: postLogs
      tags:
        - logs
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: source
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: >
            Corresponds for source of logs
          example: "app"
      requestBody:
        description: Actual logs body
        required: true
        content:
          text/plain:
            schema:
              type: string
              example: 'Error NullEx in "app/src/module.kt:42:1337"'
      responses:
        '202':
          description: Accepted
          content:
            text/plain:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: "202 Accepted"
        default:
          description: Some (un)expected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SomeError'

components:
  schemas:

    SomeError:
      type: object
      properties:
        error:
          type: boolean
        message:
          type: string
      example:
        error: true
        message: 'No such action. Try another'

    TinyGroup:
      type: object
      properties:
        groupName:
          type: string
        groupSuffix:
          type: string
      required:
        - groupName
        - groupSuffix
      example:
        - groupName: ИАБВ-12-99
          groupSuffix: Кафедра ЫЫЫ

    Option:
      type: object
      properties:
        weeks:
          type: array
          items:
            type: number
        name:
          type: string
        type:
          type: string
        tutor:
          type: string
        place:
          type: string
        link:
          type: string
      required:
        - name
        - type

    Lesson:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/Option'

    DaySchedule:
      type: object
      properties:
        day:
          type: string
        odd:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Lesson'
        even:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Lesson'
      required:
        - day
        - odd
        - even
      example:
        day: вторник
        odd:
          - weeks:
            - 1
            - 5
            - 7
            - 9
            - 11
            - 13
            - 15
            name: Физика
            type: лк
            tutor: Сафронов А.А.
            place: Д
            link: https://online-edu.mirea.ru
          - weeks:
            - 1
            - 5
            - 7
            - 9
            - 11
            - 13
            - 15
            name: Структуры и алгоритмы обработки данных
            type: лк
            tutor: Алпатов А.Н.
            place: Д
            link: https://online-edu.mirea.ru
          - weeks:
            - 9
            name: Структуры и алгоритмы обработки данных
            type: лк
            tutor: Алпатов А.Н.
            place: Д
            link: https://online-edu.mirea.ru
          - []
          - []
          - []
        even:
          - weeks:
            name: Физика
            type: лк
            tutor: Сафронов А.А.
            place: Д
            link: https://online-edu.mirea.ru
          - weeks:
            name: Объектно-ориентированное программирование
            type: лк
            tutor: Путуридзе З.Ш.
            place: Д
            link: https://online-edu.mirea.ru
          - []
          - []
          - weeks:
            - 10
            - 12
            name: Объектно-ориентированное программирование
            type: пр
            tutor: Люлява Д.В.
            place: И-205-б
            link:
          - weeks:
            - 10
            - 12
            name: Объектно-ориентированное программирование
            type: пр
            tutor: Люлява Д.В.
            place: И-205-б
            link:

    RichGroup:
      type: object
      properties:
        groupName:
          type: string
        groupSuffix:
          type: string
        remoteFile:
          type: string
        unitName:
          type: string
        unitCourse:
          type: string
        lessonsTimes:
          type: array
          items:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
        updatedDate:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        schedule:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/DaySchedule'
      required:
        - groupName
        - groupSuffix
        - remoteFile
        - unitName
        - unitCourse
        - lessonsTimes
        - updatedDate
        - schedule
      example:
        groupName: "ИКБО-03-20"
        groupSuffix: "ИППО"
        remoteFile: "https://webservices.mirea.ru/.../file.xlsx"
        unitName: "Институт информационных технологий"
        unitCourse: "Бакалавриат/специалитет, 1 курс"

            - 10:40 – 12:10
            - 12:40 – 14:10
            - 14:20 – 15:50

            - 18:00 – 19:30
            - 9:00 – 10:30

            - 12:40 – 14:10

      type: object
      properties:
        groupsCount:
          type: number
        scrapperUpdatedDate:
          type: string
          format: date-time
      required:
        - groupsCount
        - scrapperUpdatedDate
      example:
        groupsCount: 1337
        scrapperUpdatedDate: "2021-10-17T22:22:22.222Z"

Error: notImplemented: path "/logs/post": post: requestBody: contents: unsupported content types: [text/plain]
